flavorText: Some seers read bones or entrails. Others just like to break things.

foreignData.flavorText: Manche Seher lesen in Knochen oder Eingeweiden. Andere schlagen am liebsten etwas kaputt.
foreignData.name: Gram des Handwerkers
foreignData.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung deiner Wahl. Hellsicht 2. (Schaue dir die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst eine beliebige Anzahl davon unter deine Bibliothek legen und den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge oben darauf.)

foreignData.flavorText: Algunos videntes leen huesos o entrañas. A otros les gusta romper cosas sin más.
foreignData.name: Lamento del artesano
foreignData.text: Destruye el artefacto o encantamiento objetivo. Adivina 2. (Mira las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca, luego pon cualquier número de ellas en el fondo de tu biblioteca y el resto en la parte superior en cualquier orden.)

foreignData.flavorText: Certains devins lisent dans les ossements ou les entrailles. D'autres se contentent de briser des objets.
foreignData.name: Tristesse de l'artisan
foreignData.text: Détruisez l'artefact ciblé ou l'enchantement ciblé. Regard 2. (Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles au-dessous de votre bibliothèque et le reste, au-dessus, dans n'importe quel ordre.)

foreignData.flavorText: Alcuni veggenti leggono le ossa o le interiora. Altri preferiscono rompere cose.
foreignData.name: Disperazione dell'Artigiano
foreignData.text: Distruggi un artefatto o un incantesimo bersaglio. Profetizza 2. (Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio, poi mettine un qualsiasi numero in fondo al tuo grimorio e le altre in cima in qualsiasi ordine.)

foreignData.flavorText: 骨や臓物を読む予見者もいれば、ただ破壊することのみを喜びとする者もいる。
foreignData.name: 職工の悲しみ
foreignData.text: アーティファクト１つかエンチャント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。占術２を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを見て、そのうちの望む枚数のカードを望む順番であなたのライブラリーの一番下に置き、残りを望む順番で一番上に置く。）

foreignData.flavorText: 뼈나 내장으로 점을 치는 예언자도 있는 반면, 물건을 부수는 것만으로도 미래를 볼 수 있는 예언자도 있다.
foreignData.name: 장인의 슬픔
foreignData.text: 마법물체 한 개나 부여마법 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 파괴한다. 점술 2. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드들 중 원하는 만큼을 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓고 나머지를 당신의 서고 맨 위에 원하는 순서대로 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Alguns videntes leem ossos ou entranhas. Outros simplesmente gostam de quebrar coisas.
foreignData.name: Pesar do Artesão
foreignData.text: Destrua o artefato ou encantamento alvo. Vidência 2. (Olhe os dois cards do topo do seu grimório. Depois, coloque qualquer número deles no fundo do seu grimório e o restante no topo em qualquer ordem.)

foreignData.flavorText: Некоторые провидцы гадают по костям и внутренностям. Другие же просто любят ломать.
foreignData.name: Печаль Мастера
foreignData.text: Уничтожьте целевой артефакт или чары. Предскажите 2. (Посмотрите две верхние карты вашей библиотеки, затем положите любое количество из них в низ вашей библиотеки, а остальные на верх вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.)

foreignData.flavorText: 有些先知卜读骨卦或研读征兆。而有些只是喜欢乱砸东西。
foreignData.name: 工匠之哀
foreignData.text: 消灭目标神器或结界。占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

foreignData.flavorText: 有些先知卜讀骨卦或研讀徵兆。而有些只是喜歡亂砸東西。
foreignData.name: 工匠之哀
foreignData.text: 消滅目標神器或結界。占卜2。（檢視你牌庫頂的兩張牌，然後將將其中任意數量的牌以任意順序置於你牌庫底，其餘則以任意順序置於你牌庫頂。）

name: Artisan's Sorrow
originalText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

rulings.text: The artifact or enchantment won’t be on the battlefield when you scry, unless it regenerated or had indestructible.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you’ll scry last. For others, that means you’ll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability’s targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t scry.

text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
